fieldname.description: Name of the form field associated with this file.

originalname.description: Name of the file on the uploader's computer.

encoding.description: Value of the `Content-Transfer-Encoding` header for this file.

mimetype.description: Value of the `Content-Type` header for this file.

size.description: Size of the file in bytes.

stream.description:
A readable stream of this file. Only available to the `_handleFile`
callback for custom `StorageEngine`s.

destination.description: `DiskStorage` only: Directory to which this file has been uploaded.

filename.description: `DiskStorage` only: Name of this file within `destination`.

path.description: `DiskStorage` only: Full path to the uploaded file.

buffer.description: `MemoryStorage` only: A Buffer containing the entire file.

readableAborted.description: Returns whether the stream was destroyed or errored before emitting `'end'`.

readable.description:
Is `true` if it is safe to call {@link read}, which means
the stream has not been destroyed or emitted `'error'` or `'end'`.

readableEncoding.description: Getter for the property `encoding` of a given `Readable` stream. The `encoding` property can be set using the {@link setEncoding} method.

readableFlowing.description:
This property reflects the current state of a `Readable` stream as described
in the [Three states](https://nodejs.org/docs/latest-v22.x/api/stream.html#three-states) section.

readableHighWaterMark.description: Returns the value of `highWaterMark` passed when creating this `Readable`.

readableLength.description:
This property contains the number of bytes (or objects) in the queue
ready to be read. The value provides introspection data regarding
the status of the `highWaterMark`.

readableObjectMode.description: Getter for the property `objectMode` of a given `Readable` stream.

errored.description: Returns error if the stream has been destroyed with an error.
